= Create Music =

== Actions ==

 * Creates/adds a music for a specified channel.

== Request ==
<table cellspacing="4" border="0">
 <tr><td>*URL*</td><td>[http://fabienrenaud.com/armp/www/createMusic.php]</td></tr>
 <tr><td>*Method*</td><td>POST</td></tr>
 <tr><td>*Authentication*</td><td>Required.</td></tr>
</table>

Mandatory parameters:
 * {{{channelId}}} = _int_ > 0
 * title = _string_ The name of the channel.
 * genre = _string_ The genre of the music.
 * duration = _int_ The music's duration in seconds.

Optional parameters:
 * source = _string_ The source of the channel, if it is a stream.
 * artist = _string_
 * album = _string_
 * year = _int_
 * track = _string_

== Response ==

That WS returns an xml file with the following tree:
 * *root*
  * *music* | id
   * *source* _(optional)_
   * *metadata* | id
    * _metadata elements*

The metadata elements are the following:
<table cellspacing="4" border="0">
<tr><td>*title*</td><td>_string_</td><td>The title of the music</td></tr>
<tr><td>*artist*</td><td>_string_</td><td>The artist/band of the music</td></tr>
<tr><td>*album*</td><td>_string_</td><td>The album name of the music</td></tr>
<tr><td>*year*</td><td>_int_</td><td>The release year of the album</td></tr>
<tr><td>*track*</td><td>_int_</td><td>The track number of the music</td></tr>
<tr><td>*genre*</td><td>_string_</td><td>The genre of the music</td></tr>
<tr><td>*duration*</td><td>_int_</td><td>The duration, in seconds, of the music</td></tr>

</table>

==== Sample ====

{{{
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<root>
  <music id="4">
    <metadata id="1">
      <title>Run Run Run</title>
      <artist>Phoenix</artist>
      <album>Alphabetical</album>
      <year>2011</year>
      <track>1</track>
      <genre>Instrumental</genre>
      <duration>200</duration>
    </metadata>
  </music>
  <logged>1</logged>
  <status>1</status>
</root>
}}}

=== Sample ===

{{{
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<root>
  <channel id="9" spotId="1">
    <name>New Chan</name>
    <user>MyUser</user>
    <genre>None</genre>
    <musics>0</musics>
    <creation>1300717041</creation>
    <update>1300717041</update>
  </channel>
  <logged>1</logged>
  <status>1</status>
</root>
}}}
